message: I have just recently heard of a brand of cigarette called Winston Light. I have seen the initial kind box celebrating the Winston Cup Championship for 45 years. I would like to purchase one of these boxes. Unfortunately, I do not know the pack needed for this boy. Could you please send me the price and order form of this item as I am unable to purchase it? Please send me a catalogue with the Winston items in it.
name: Darrell F. Giles
